name: Scissr
body:
## Scissr helps you to create instant data in your favorite editor

```
fname,lname,age*3
```
outputs
```
[{
    "fname":"Joe",
    "lanme":"Soap",
    "age": 21
},
{
    "fname":"Peter",
    "lanme":"Perker",
    "age": 32
},
{
    "fname":"Willy",
    "lanme":"Wonka",
    "age": 28
}]
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
